sentences: Erlend Slettevoll (born 26 October 1981) is a Norwegian jazz pianist, known from cooperation with musicians like Ola Kvernberg, Petter Wettre, Heidi Skjerve, Kjetil Møster, Steinar Raknes and Espen Aalberg.
Career ==
Slettevoll was born in Volda and is a graduate of the jazz program at Trondheim Musikkonservatorium (2001–05).
He was first recognized as member of the band The Core together with fellow students in Trondheim, Kjetil Møster, Steinar Raknes and Espen Aalberg.
Later he worked with musicians like Petter Wettre and Heidi Skjerve.
Grand General is the latest project including Slettevoll.
Having played a few gigs as Kenneth Kapstad Group this lineup released their debut album Grand General in 2013.
Violinist Ola Kvernberg, who was awarded Spellemannprisen for his album Liarbird, was in the forefront.
One can not help comparing the music on this album with the Mahavishnu Orchestra, with a delicate interplay between the soloists and an impressive rhythm section.
